org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io
Interface IAeBpelFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractBpelFactory
public interface IAeBpelFactory

Factory for reading and writing BPEL. Each factory deals with a specific version of BPEL. The factories also contain a registry that maps elements to def objects and def objects to element names. These registries can be overridden if desired.

Method Summary
 IAeBpelReader createBpelReader()
          Gets an object capable of reading BPEL xml into our definition objects.
 IAeBpelWriter createBpelWriter()
          Gets an object capable of writing our def objects into BPEL xml.
 IAeBpelRegistry getBpelRegistry()
          Getter for the currently installed BPEL registry
 void setBpelRegistry(IAeBpelRegistry aRegistry)
          An override for the BPEL registry.
